db:article.db:para: The Qt Widgets module extends Qt GUI with C++ widget functionality.

db:listitem.db:para: The QItemEditorCreator class makes it possible to create item editor creator bases without subclassing QItemEditorCreatorBase.
The QStandardItemEditorCreator class provides the possibility to register widgets without having to subclass QItemEditorCreatorBase.
The QStylePainter class is a convenience class for drawing QStyle elements inside a widget.
The QTileRules class provides the rules used to draw a pixmap or image split into nine segments.
